channel.title: CVE Feed for Bitdefender -- Endpoint Security Tools
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Bitdefender -- Endpoint Security Tools

item.title: CVE-2021-3553|2024-09-17T01:25:41.833Z -- bitdefender -- endpoint%20security%20tools
item.description: A Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in the EPPUpdateService of Bitdefender Endpoint Security Tools allows an attacker to use the Endpoint Protection relay as a proxy for any remote host. This issue affects: Bitdefender Endpoint Security Tools versions prior to 6.6.27.390; versions prior to 7.1.2.33. Bitdefender Unified Endpoint for Linux versions prior to 6.2.21.160. Bitdefender GravityZone versions prior to 6.24.1-1.
